titles: Brief instructions for making observations in all parts of the world as also, for collecting, preserving, and sending over natural things : being an attempt to settle an universal correspondence for the advancement of knowledg both natural and civil / drawn up at the request of a person of honour and presented to the Royal Society.
author: Woodward, John, 1665-1728.
notes: Written by John Woodward.  Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Scientific apparatus and instruments --  Early works to 1800.
